email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for a 100,000 MT cargo. The vessel has a DWT of 120,000 and an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per MT. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Given the current market, we were hoping for something in the mid-40s. Could you check if there’s any flexibility? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve discussed with the owners, and they’re willing to adjust the freight rate to $49.50 per MT. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $49.50 sounds more reasonable. We can proceed with that rate. Could you confirm the laycan is still October 15-20? Also, please send over the full charter party for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. Yes, the laycan remains October 15-20. I’ll send over the charter party draft shortly. Just to confirm, the load port is Ras Tanura, and the discharge port is Rotterdam, under INCOTERMS CIF. Let me know if you need any further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the confirmation. Everything looks good on our end. We’ll review the charter party and get back to you by end of day. Appreciate your help. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, glad to hear it. I’ll be on standby for your feedback on the charter party. Let me know if there’s anything else you need. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best regards, Sarah
